page.shortlink: api objects context object resolve mime type method

return.name: Result
return.description: Returns the MIME type of the given file name.

page.description: Returns the MIME type of the given file name.
page.discussion: Context.ResolveMimeType(filename as C) returns the MIME type of the given file name. The filename paramter can be a full file name, or only an extension. Example: Context.ResolveMimeType("index.html") will return text/html, and Context.ResolveMimeType(".json") will return application/json.
